title: Urn
text:
This urn features the tiger lily and flattened arch motifs of Maher's decorative scheme for Rockledge. Interior photos of the house show an urn holding an arrangement of prairie plants and flowers.

[insert photo of Rockledge interior showing urn here - Architectural Record photo]
description: tall flower on each side panel; shoulder consists of four arches
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
